glimpse.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a quick look at someone or something that does not allow you to see them clearly
glimpse.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: We only had a fleeting glimpse of the river.
They caught a glimpse of a dark green car.
glimpse.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a short experience of something that helps you begin to understand it
glimpse.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: a glimpse of what life might be like in the future
glimpse.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to see someone or something for a moment without getting a complete view of them
glimpse.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: I glimpsed a figure at the window.
glimpse.translation[1].definitions[1].de: to begin to understand something for a moment
glimpse.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: For the first time she glimpsed the truth about her sister.
